cvm-driver-defs.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Core Driver: Debug macros and wqe manipulation. Include this file in all applications.

Function Documentation

static void* cvm_drv_fpa_alloc_async ( uint64_t  scratch_pad,
uint64_t  pool 
) [inline, static]

Core: Common Asynchronous allocation routine for all core driver components.

Parameters:
scratch_pad,: scratch pad location where address of new buffer will be written by hardware.
pool : The pool from which async allocation is done.
Returns:
If allocation was successful, return ptr to buffer, else NULL.

static void cvm_free_host_instr ( cvmx_wqe_t *  wqe  )  [inline, static]

Core: Free a work queue entry (WQE) and its buffers received from the hardware.

Parameters:
wqe - work queue entry buffer to be freed. Frees a work queue entry and its packet data buffer.

Definition at line 224 of file cvm-driver-defs.h.

References cvm_free_wqe_packet_bufs().

static void cvm_free_wqe_packet_bufs ( cvmx_wqe_t *  wqe  )  [inline, static]

Core: Call this routine to free the packet buffers in a work queue entry (WQE).

The packet pointer is made NULL and buf count is 0 in the WQE when this routine returns.

Parameters:
wqe - the wqe whose buffers are to be freed.
